name: hydroapps
description: This is the base node module for all the HydroApps frontend packages.

scripts.i18n-js-to-po: i18next-conv -l de -s src/kombstra/locales/de.json -t src/kombstra/locales/de.po && i18next-conv -l en -s src/kombstra/locales/en.json -t src/kombstra/locales/en.po
scripts.i18n-po-to-js: if exist src/kombstra/locales/de.po (npx i18next-conv -s src/kombstra/locales/de.po -t src/kombstra/locales/de.json -l de) & if exist src/kombstra/locales/en.po (npx i18next-conv -s src/kombstra/locales/en.po -t src/kombstra/locales/en.json -l en)

author: Max Schmit
